baseline_groups.claim_summary: Higher AI exposure (Webb patent-based measure) is associated with positive changes in female employment shares across European occupations and sectors.
baseline_groups.notes: Webb measure baseline is marginally insignificant (p=0.068).

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Higher AI exposure (Felten ability-application-based measure) is associated with positive changes in female employment shares across European occupations and sectors.
baseline_groups.notes: Felten measure baseline is strongly significant (p=0.0005).

global_notes: Paper uses two alternative AI exposure measures (Webb patent-based, Felten ability-based) as parallel treatments. Sector-specific subsamples are heterogeneity. Alternative outcome shWomen tests a different estimand.
